title: Cossacks 3 The Golden Age-RELOADED
description:
Cossacks 3 The Golden Age  (c) GSC Game World

08/2017 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Strategy

"Cossacks 3: The Golden Age" would impress you with a bunch of exciting
content - its a whole new thrilling multiplayer gamemode "Historical Battle",
intriguing single player scenarios, amazing campaign, early access to 2 new
anticipated nations and 5 new units, and of course 2 new amazing tracks!

The game is made standalone and includes all previous updates and dlc's!

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

MINIMUM:
OS: Windows XP/7/8/10
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz / Core i3 1.6GHz / AMD Athlon II X2 280
Memory: 3 GB RAM

Additional Notes: Screen Resolution - 1280x768
